short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays quick information about the current price of Litecoin in your browser's toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
------------------

This plugin displays the current Litecoin (LTC) price in USD ($) from coindesk.com simply in your browser's toolbar so you can see it immediately.

Functions
----------------

- price check every minute
- badge color according to the current exchange rate
- clicking on the icon redirects to statistics
- currency: USD

History
-------------

v 1.0.0 (07.01.2021)

- price check every minute
- badge color according to the current exchange rate
- clicking on the icon redirects to statistics
- currency: USD
